short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Build instant emails with just a click of a button for free

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Goodbits helps your team collect content and save time — using both the browser extension and automatically — while providing drag & drop ease for building gorgeous responsive email campaigns.
CURATE & COLLECT
- Save content as you browse with this Chrome Extension
- Automatically extract and crop images from the content
- Prepare your newsletter, editor-free
DELIVER & LEARN
- Send to your existing lists and segments
- Build using one of our templates or your own custom template
- Use one of our well-designed templates for desktop, tablet and mobile
- Improve by using analytics to know which content works
OTHER FEATURES:
- Easy thumbnail generation with cropping, we host them for your emails
- Preview the design and send test emails
- Schedule email campaigns to be sent anytime
Install and register for free to start building you next email in minutes.
